mapper.insert: insert into account (dId, uId, payTime, fee, feeType, payType, rId, cId) values (#{dId}, #{uId}, #{payTime}, #{fee}, #{feeType}, #{payType}, #{rId}, #{cId})
mapper.update: update account a JOIN account_examinationapplication ae on a.accId = ae.accId set uId = #{uId} where rId = #{rId} and ae.eAId = #{eAId}
